## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G18140](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G18140)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LST8-1</u>
- **Gene Name:** Lethal with Sec Thirteen 8-1
- **Description:**   Transducin/WD40 repeat-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G18140.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G18140.1)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[AT3G18140.2](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G18140.2)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SAIL_641_D10]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;lst8-1 mutants exhibit slower growth, high branching and abnormal development of flowers. Mutants show early senescence when shifted to long days and fail to accumulate raffinose. Mutants contain high levels of amino-acids and starch.
   - [SALK_002459]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;lst8-1 mutants exhibit slower growth, high branching and abnormal development of flowers. Mutants show early senescence when shifted to long days and fail to accumulate raffinose. Mutants contain high levels of amino-acids and starch.
